Row.Text: All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor. Pay 33% less for Naval Unit maintenance. +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections.
You must be at war against the trade route owner to plunder this unit.
Your opponent's unique ability prevents this unit from being plundered.
